sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; // Adjust the import path as necessary const features = [ { icon: "⚡", title: "Instant Code Sharing", desc: "Share code snippets instantly with the community, just like tweeting your thoughts.", color: "bg-blue-500", }, { icon: "🌐", title: "Global Developer Network", desc: "Connect with developers worldwide, follow, and collaborate on projects.", color: "bg-green-500", }, { icon: "💬", title: "Real-time Discussions", desc: "Comment, like, and discuss code in real-time, Twitter-style threads.", color: "bg-purple-500", }, { icon: "📈", title: "Portfolio Growth", desc: "Build your public profile and showcase your best work to the world.", color: "bg-pink-500", }, { icon: "🤝", title: "Collaboration Tools", desc: "Work together on code, get feedback, and grow as a team.", color: "bg-yellow-500", }, { icon: "🔒", title: "Secure & Private", desc: "Your code and data are protected with industry-standard security.", color: "bg-gray-700", }, { icon: "🎨", title: "Customizable Profiles", desc: "Personalize your profile with avatars, bios, and social links.", color: "bg-indigo-500", }, { icon: "📱", title: "Mobile Friendly", desc: "Enjoy a seamless experience on any device, just like Twitter.", color: "bg-blue-700", }, { icon: "🔔", title: "Notifications", desc: "Stay updated with real-time notifications for likes, comments, and follows.", color: "bg-red-500", }, { icon: "🧑‍💻", title: "Verified Developer Badges", desc: "Earn badges and recognition for your contributions.", color: "bg-green-700", }, ]; const Features = () => (
Back to Home

Features

Discover all the powerful features DevMate offers to help you connect, code, and grow—styled with a modern Twitter-inspired look.

{features.map((f, i) => (
{f.icon}

{f.title}

{f.desc}

))}
Get Started Free
); export default Features;
